text: LDV Pilot was a van and minibus made by LDV Limited from 1993 to 2006. In 2003, the model was improved at the front and back, It had a transparent front and back headlights. In 2006, the Pilot was replaced by the LDV Maxus. ==Gallery== File:Howletts Free Mini Bus near Bekesbourne Railway Station - geograph.org.uk - 2059485 (cropped).jpg|LDV Pilot rear (before improvements) File:P920RSC LDV Pilot Pot Bus.jpg|LDV Pilot Royal Mail Postbus (before improvements) File:Solar-Powered LDV Pilot?
